modName: A Galaxy Far Far Away         Races of SW Universe
summary: The Jedi are trained to use the Force through passive meditation, practicing selflessness, and commitment to justice while at the same time rejecting emotions such as passion, fear, anger and hate. Their traditional weapon is the lightsaber, a device which emits a blade-like controlled plasma flow.
descriptionHtml:
The Jedi are trained to use the Force through passive meditation, practicing selflessness, and commitment to justice while at the same time rejecting emotions such as passion, fear, anger and hate. Their traditional weapon is the lightsaber, a device which emits a blade-like controlled plasma flow. 

The Sith Order was a sect of Force-sensitives who utilized the dark side of the Force.The Sith were the most infamous of all dark side religions, and the members of the cult were often seen as the pinnacle of power within the dark side. 
The Sith Code 
"Peace is a lie, there is only passion. 
Through passion, I gain strength. 
Through strength, I gain power. 
Through power, I gain victory. 
Through victory, my chains are broken. 
The Force shall free me." 
?The Sith Code 

Choose your race 
Sith lord, Jedi, Mandalorian, Zabrak, Chazrach, Yuuzhan Vong, Chiss, Cathar, Mon Calamari, Trandoshan, and Gran. more to come.

Abilities and Spells 
The Force 
the Force is an energy field created by all living things binding the galaxy together, its mystic power can be harnassed for good or evil 
The Living Force 
Mindful of the future and the possible consequences of their actions, but remain focused on the present. 
Force Concealment 
The Force conceals you 
Force Sense 
Allows you to see enemies life force through walls 
Jedi Weapon Disarm 
Use the force and disarm your opponents from a distance. 
Force Run 
Use the Force to run faster for 5 seconds. 
Jedi Healer 
Heal any NPC you choose. 
Jedi Mind Trick 
Make an NPC be your follower for five minutes 
Force choke 
Able to grap npc's and choke them and throw them afterwards 
Force Litghtning 
Dark side Electric shock therapy 

There are a total of 20 new eye textures for the new races. and the zabrak race does have the horns. 

CREDITS 
Zabrak Race and Sith Race by Zuna Stormcloak (ZunaSW) 
Focrce Lightning base model by JackoO 
Death Grip animation Onyxbl4e 
Apachii Skyhair leia hair 
SPECIAL THANKS 

Thanks Bethseda and the Skyrim Gamers 
Thanks Lucas Films 
Thanks Apachii Hair (Leia Bun hair Style) 
Thanks ZunaSW for the Zabrak and Sith Races 
Thanks Lunar_mando for helping me with new spell ideas and a few descriptions. 
and Thanks Star Wars Fans.
author: KalEltheKryptonian and ZunaSW
